subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Trout, who led off Tuesday’s American League victory with a home run, is now 5 for 10 with two walks, two doubles, a triple and a home run in four All-Star Games.
snippet: Trout, who led off Tuesday’s American League victory with a home run, is now 5 for 10 with two walks, two doubles, a triple and a home run in four All-Star Games.
